name: Snow War: Sniper Shooting 19
description:
Snow War: Sniper Shooting 19 is a complete war game which features a real army military mission that you never felt in all military games. Your mission is to eliminate your enemies from your territory and clear the army base. Hold your sniper gun as a real commando and eliminate all the enemy soldiers before they hit and finish you.
Features:
- First Person Shooting (FPS).
- Different type of sniper guns
- Real army battlefield environment.
- Easy and user-friendly Interface.
- Extra Rewards on completing mission in time.
